P100026.project_name: National Initiative for Human Development Support Project (INDH)

keywords.cdata: accountability, accounting, aid agencies, authorization, autonomy, basic education, basic infrastructure, basic social services, budgetary allocations, budgetary resources, capacity building, Central government, citizens, civil society, civil society organizations, community driven development, community-driven development, Competitive Bidding, Decentralization, decentralization process, decision making, decision making process, decision-makers, deconcentration, development interventions, development plans, Development Policy, economic opportunities, EIB, elderly, elderly people, elected officials, execution, Expenditure, Extreme Vulnerability, farm income, financial, Financial Analysis, financial assistance, financial data, Financial Management, government administration, government agencies, government officials, government programs, Governmental Organization, Gross Domestic Product, housing, HUMAN DEVELOPMENT, Human Development Index, income, income inequality, income-generating activities, information system, informed decisions, institution building, Institutional arrangements, Institutional Capacity, land tenure, living conditions, local authorities, local capacity, local communities, local development, local governance, local governments, local population, Middle East, Millennium Challenge, Ministers, national elections, national government, national governments, Nations, participatory planning, participatory process, participatory processes, Policy Framework, political

project_abstract.cdata: The National Human Development Initiative (INDH) Project for Morocco will assist the Government in improving inclusiveness, accountability and transparency of decision making and implementation processes at the local level in order to enhance use of social and economic infrastructure and services by poor and vulnerable groups.  The project is composed of the following components: component one - alleviate poverty in rural areas; component two: alleviate social exclusion in urban areas; component three - alleviate extreme vulnerability; and component four - mainstreaming INDH governance mechanisms and strengthening of institutional capacity.

P100026.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>AR</LangCode><ProjectName>مشروع مساندة المبادرة الوطنية للتنمية البشرية</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>سيساعد مشروع مساندة المبادرة الوطنية للتنمية البشرية بالمغرب الحكومة على تحسين شمولية ومساءلة وشفافية عمليات اتخاذ القرار والتنفيذ على المستوى المحلي لتشجيع استخدام البنية الأساسية الاجتماعية والاقتصادية والخدمات من قبل الفقراء والفئات المعرضة للمعاناة. ويتألف المشروع من المكونات التالية: 1) تخفيف حدة الفقر في المناطق الريفية؛ 2) الحد من الاستبعاد الاجتماعي في المناطق الحضرية؛ 3) تخفيف حدة التعرض للمخاطر؛ و4) تعميم آليات حوكمة (حكامة) مشروع مساندة المبادرة الوطنية للتنمية البشرية وتعزيز قدرة المؤسسات.</ProjectAbstract></Project><Project><LangCode>ES</LangCode><ProjectName>Projet d’appui à l’Initiative nationale pour le développement humain (INDH)</ProjectName></Project><Project><LangCode>FR</LangCode><ProjectName>Projet d’appui à l’Initiative nationale pour le développement humain (INDH)</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>Le Projet d’appui à l’Initiative nationale pour le développement humain (INDH) aidera le Gouvernement marocain à améliorer l’inclusivité, la redevabilité et la transparence des processus de prise de décision et d’exécution au niveau local, afin de développer l’utilisation des infrastructures de base et des services sociaux et économiques par les populations pauvres ou vulnérables. Il compte quatre composantes : réduction de la pauvreté en milieu rural (composante 1) ; réduction de l’exclusion sociale en milieu urbain (composante 2) ; lutte contre l’extrême précarité (composante 3) ; et renforcement des mécanismes de gouvernance et des capacités institutionnelles de l’INDH (composante 4).</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
